review: I have been seeing Dr Sukanya for assistance with getting pregnant, after recovering from the last miscarriage. Her expertise and dedication are evident in the personalized care plan she created for me. It gave me hope and strength. She has been encouraging, attentive, and thorough. I highly recommend Dr Sukanya to anyone seeking a knowledgeable and caring gynae. Her commitment to her patients well-being is remarkable. I thank her for everything she has been doing for me.

review: During my last visit with Dr. Sukanya Patra, I was once again impressed by her professionalism and warmth. She took the time to listen to my concerns attentively and provided clear explanations regarding my treatment options. Her thoroughness and expertise reassured me throughout the consultation, making me feel genuinely cared for as a patient. The entire experience, from scheduling to follow-up, was seamless, thanks to her efficient and friendly staff. Dr. Patra's dedication to her field and her patients is truly commendable, and I look forward to continuing my care under her guidance.

review: My experience with Dr. Patra has been extremely good. She is very patient while hearing a patient out. Her approach also seemed to be personalised to a patient's need, as opposed  to a one-size-fits-all approach. It helps a lot that she is willing to devote time and is extremely thorough. I was particularly happy with the detailed notes she makes in relation to the case, on every visit. It was very helpful to have detailed record of the treatment over a period of time. The fact that she is hands-on makes a big difference to the patient's comfort level. It was very easy to reach out to her for even small doubts that cropped every now and then, all the same when urgent care was needed, she was again immediately available to ensure that any emergency is attended to on priority. The overall experience has been very good.
